reference_summary:
9A Body wave bundles with closure Brazilian human hair 4 bundles with lace closure Unprocessed Brazilian body wave virgin hair bundles with closure 4X4 Lace Middle Part (22 24 26 28+20) {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 6.1 x 2.2 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'UPC': '699747934107'} I paid $189.99 for this hair that I had to take off 1 week after install. It's PURE GARBAGE. NOT human hair, NOT 9A grade. My hair burned when I tried to flat iron it at 250 degrees!. Tangled like crazy and shedded like a cat. I contacted the seller to tell them this hair was no good and they offered me a 30% refund IF I give them a GOOD (LYING) REVIEW. What a joke. Any other amazon seller would apologize for the inconvenience and offer you a replacement or refund to keep you happy. $189.99 dollars I will never see again. What a disappointment, trowed the whole bundles in the garbage and was forced to buy a wig.

DO NOT, I repeat DO NOT waste your money on this. Look for another amazon vendor and READ all 1 star reviews, those are the ones that really tell you how it is. HAIR IS GARBAGE DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Natural Waterproof Mascara Extra Long Lash,Thick Thickening and Lengthening, No Clumping, No Smudging, Lasting Voluminous Eyelashes Dramatic Extension Mascara SIKEMAY {'Color': 'Black', 'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676852', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'} This Mascara is so esthetically pleasing :) so beautiful packaging and big. I can’t get over how full they make my eyelashes look! Order it now! Esthetically Pleasing !!! I got on board work it lol. The rose quartz feels cold to the touch of your skin proving the skin with a fresh clean feeling after applying your moisturizer. The spike roller is for after washing your face. Very nice combo on selling both of them together. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality beauty products, particularly in cosmetics and hair care. Recent interest in luxury eyelashes indicates a growing enthusiasm for visually appealing aesthetic enhancements that also offer good performance, aligning with their previous focus on quality.

- **Value for Money:** The user is still critical of overpriced items lacking in quality. However, the recent purchase of eyelashes with a positive review shows an increased willingness to invest in products that deliver notable aesthetic results and perceived value.

- **Experience with Vendors:** While still cautious of vendor integrity regarding customer service and refund policies, the positive experience with the recent eyelash purchase may lead to a broader exploration of new sellers who demonstrate effective customer care.

- **Sentiment Towards Reviews:** Consistently relies on detailed and credible reviews to guide purchasing decisions, maintaining a particular focus on negative experiences. However, the recent favorable review suggests a slight shift towards valuing products that exceed expectations, regardless of prior skepticism.

- **Feedback and Resolution:** The user continues to expect satisfactory resolutions from vendors when products fall short. Their willingness to recommend items they appreciate reflects a budding trust in well-performing products.

- **Overall Attitude:** The user still critiques misleading quality claims but is beginning to embrace products that prove effective. The recent endorsement for the eyelashes indicates a subtle shift toward a more positive outlook on beauty products that deliver genuine satisfaction.
